data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 614,500 people living in Phichit through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phichit, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 614,500 people living in the state of Phichit.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Phichit.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Phichit, Thailand to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 614,500 souls in Phichit and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Phichit, Thailand need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Phichit that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

location.name: Phichit
location.cities_list: Phichit, Taphan Hin, Bang Mun Nak, Thap Khlo, Wang Sai Phun
